column5: Spacious 3 bedroom/3.5 bath townhouse, has 3 floors with a balcony overlooking the pool on the top 2 floors and a patio on the first floor that leads to the pool. The garage is stocked with goodies including boogie boards and floaties as well as golf clubs, a grill and fishing poles, the kitchen is fully equipped with everything you might need, there are a total of 5 beds to sleep 10 guests comfortably and the beach is right at the end of the block. Cable and wifi are provided. Enjoy!
column8: Summer Dreams - You have to see it to believe it!
